string.value: |That was a tough battle. What are going to do with this head anyway?
|First I must find a way to separate the head from the body. ItТ tricky... I see! A couple of minutes more...
|Done. Now I may return to the OracleТs disciples.
|What is this shinning? Looks like one of the artifacts the Oracle was talking about.
|Well done! Now to the second one.
|IТve got all I need. The Oracle will be pleased.
|The first repairer is in place. What a nimble fellow!
|The second repairer got down to work. Time to deliver the last one.
|The last one is ready to work. I hope it will help the Oracle to regain his memories.
|IТve seen a lot during my travels. But I still donТt get why anyone would leave these mysterious traces on fields.
|The scientists of Midgard can solve this mystery.
|The passage is too narrow. My truck wonТt go through. And I am not going to walk!
|I should find a smaller vehicle. I think I saw something like that nearby.
|Thanks to the person who left this car here. I can sneak to the factory on this mount.
|I think no one will object if I borrow if for a while. LetТs check fuel... ignition... Engine start!
|Incredible speed. I can hardly control it.
|I have nothing to do there.
|Here comes the monster. I doubt, he will give up his head without fight.
|A strong adversary, but I can handle him!
|IТve never seen such huge ruins. I wonder what was there before the catastrophe...
|The main entrance is blocked; IТll try my luck following the railroad.
You cannot leave this place on this vehicle. It is too dangerous. You'd better use your own truck.
Do you wish to travel to another region?
